item.title: I-26 Exit 32 Offramp at TNS-173 East
item.description: I-26 Exit 32 Offramp at TNS-173 East, a Tennessee Scenic Parkway. Use TNS-173 east for Alt. I-26 junction.

item.description: I-26 West/US-23 North in Unicoi County. US-23 is a Tennessee Scenic Byway.

item.description: I-26 west at Sams Gap at the North Carolina - Tennessee state line.

item.title: I-26 West Approaching Sams Gap
item.description: I-26 west approaching Sams Gap. Use left two lanes for I-26 West/Johnson City. Trucks use right lane for brake check area.

item.description: I-26 West/I-240 East at Exit 2 - Bus. US-19/Bus. US-23/West Asheville. Approaching Exit 3A - US-19 South/US-23 South/Asheville.

item.title: I-26 West/I-240 East - Exits 1B and 1C
item.description: I-26 West/I-240 East at Exit 1B - NC-191/Brevard Road. Approaching Exit 1C - Amboy Road.

item.title: I-26 West/I-240 East - Asheville
item.description: Asheville City Limit on I-26 West/I-240 East.

item.title: I-26 West/I-240 East - Exit 1B
item.description: I-26 West/I-240 East approaching Exit 1B - NC-191/Brevard Road. The mileposts along the I-26/I-240 overlap in Asheville use the distance from I-240. This is not usual for a primary route to use the mileposts for a loop route. However, I-26 becomes Future I-26 north of I-240.

item.title: I-26 West - Exit 31B
item.description: I-26 west at Exit 31B (Left Exit) - I-40 West/US-74 West/Canton/Knoxville (TN). Continue straight for I-26 West/I-240 East/Asheville.

item.title: I-26 West - Exits 31A and 31B
item.description: I-26 west at Exit 31A - I-40 East/Hickory/Biltmore Estate. Approaching Exit 31B - I-40 West/US-74 West/Knoxville (TN)/Canton. Continue straight for I-26 West/I-240 East/Asheville Downtown/Johnson City (TN). US-74 leaves I-26 westbound and joins I-40 westbound.

item.title: I-26 West - Exits 31A-B
item.description: I-26 west approaching Exits 31A-B - I-40/I-240/Hickory/Knoxville (TN).

item.title: NC-280 East at I-26/US-74 West to Asheville
item.description: NC-280 East at I-26/US-74 West to Asheville. This intersection is a diverging diamond interchange, and is why the traffic is on the left.

item.title: NC-280 East at I-26 West/US-74 West
item.description: NC-280 East at I-26 West/US-74 West (Exit 40)

item.title: NC-280 East at I-26/US-74
item.description: NC-280 East at I-26/US-74 in Buncombe County. Merge right for I-26 East/US-74 East/Hendersonville; merge left for I-26 West/US-74 West/Asheville; continue straight on NC-280 East for Arden.

item.title: NC-280 East/NC-191 North at NC-191 Split
item.description: NC-280 East/NC-191 North at NC-191 Split. Turn left for NC-191 north; continue straight on NC-280 for I-26.
